title: 26 symbols
content:
Hi everybody,  
I recently started a new blog. It’s a place to put my lettering sketches as a way to make myself practice everyday (so new posts should be semi-daily). I’ll also write about things happening in the world of type design, lettering and design. Let me know what you think and check back often!  
 [http://www.26symbols.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021042010/http:/www.26symbols.com/)  
Josh
author: scruggsdesign

comments.content: Thanks for sharing, Josh: a lot of interesting stuff, well presented.
